titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation declaring the seasonable times when vvarrants for venison in the Kings forrests, chases, or parks are to be served.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: VVhitehall, the seventeenth day of January, in the thirteenth yeer of Our reigne.
Dates are given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 13; Steele notation: Male are and.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
